A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t know what movie the people rating this one so low saw\, but what I saw last night was epic. It moved the mythology forward (no mitochondria or Jar Jar) and the character development and story were epic. Having been a Star Wars fan since I saw the original 40 years ago\, I think this was perfection. It was beautiful\, emotional\, intense\, funny and sad. I don’t know why there are so many haters\, except that they want to be “cool” and above it all. This was an epic\, exciting movie experience.
